AntiSeptix Multi-Surface Disinfectant Wipes

Disinfects your home leaving it hygienic and smelling clean

Antiseptix Multi Surface Disinfectant is a surface disinfectant spray that kills 99.9% of bacteria, fungus and viruses, including E.coli, salmonella, coronavirus, poliovirus, norovirus, monkey pox and flu. Antiseptix Multi Surface Disinfectant is a chemical free, ZERO alcohol, non-toxic, fragrance-free disinfectant that has odour eliminating properties, as well as being harmless to the skin.

Features

Kills Viruses (coronavirus, poliovirus, norovirus, flu, adenovirus)

Kills Bacteria (e. coli, salmonella)

Kills Fungus

Non-Toxic â€“ safe for your skin

100% natural

Chemical free

Food safe

Vegan

Pet safe

Child safe

FAQs

While this can be used on a variety of worktop surfaces, for more detail, refer to the product use on the product label on the bottle.

Antiseptix Multi Surface Disinfectant, along with all Antiseptix products are recyclable. We urge our customers to tear off the label of the Antiseptix Multi Surface Disinfectant bottle using the perforated peal. All components can we be recycled. A thank you in advanced for helping us recycle and save the environment.

How to Use

  1. Turn the spray nozzle to â€˜ONâ€™ position
  2. Keep bottle upright, spray from 20- 25 cm away
  3. Leave to work for up to 5 minutes
  4. Wipe clean!

Safety Instructions

  • External use only.
  • When using this product, keep out of eyes, ears and mouth.
  • In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.
  • Keep out of reach of children.
  • If Swallowed seek medical attention if you feel unwell.

Ingredients

  • 1% w/v Saline

AntiSeptix PRO Industrial. Commercial. Professional.
